mapper.sql:
t_house_appointment.id, t_house_appointment.code, t_house_appointment.type_id AS typeId, t_house_appointment.type, t_house_appointment.user_id AS userId, t_house_appointment.user_phone AS userPhone, t_house_appointment.user_name AS userName, t_house_appointment.server_id AS serverId, t_house_appointment.server_name AS serverName, t_house_appointment.server_phone AS serverPhone, t_house_appointment.name, t_house_appointment.address_id AS addressId, t_house_appointment.address_name AS addressName, t_house_appointment.description, t_house_appointment.icon, t_house_appointment.status, t_house_appointment.fee, t_house_appointment.create_time AS createTime, t_house_appointment.appointment_time AS appointmentTime, t_house_appointment.appointment_end_time AS appointmentEndTime,
t_house_appointment.close_time AS closeTime, t_house_appointment.payment_timestamp AS paymentTimestamp, t_house_appointment.payment_method AS paymentMethod, t_house_appointment.earliest_time AS earliestTime, t_house_appointment.latest_time AS latestTime, t_house_appointment.field_c AS fieldC
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_appointment.* FROM t_house_appointment WHERE t_house_appointment.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_appointment.id

SELECT
FROM t_house_appointment
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_appointment.id =#{record.id}
AND t_house_appointment.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.code},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.type_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.typeId},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.type},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.user_id =#{record.userId}
AND t_house_appointment.user_phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userPhone},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userName},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.server_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.serverId},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.server_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.serverName},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.server_phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.serverPhone},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.name},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.address_id =#{record.addressId}
AND t_house_appointment.address_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.addressName},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.description},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.icon LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.icon},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.status},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.confirm_status=#{record.confirmStatus}
AND t_house_appointment.fee LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.fee},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.appointment_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.appointmentTime},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.close_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.closeTime},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.payment_timestamp LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.paymentTimestamp},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.payment_method LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.paymentMethod},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.earliest_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.earliestTime},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.latest_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.latestTime},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.field_c LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.fieldC},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_appointment.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.sql:
t_house_appointment.*,
t1.name AS serverName, t1.phone AS serverPhone, t1.avatar AS serverAvatar, t1.real_name AS serverRealName,
t2.name AS userName, t2.phone AS userPhone, t2.avatar AS userAvatar, t2.real_name AS userRealName,
t_house_rent_asset.id as rentId, t_house_rent_asset.asset_id AS assetId, t_house_rent_asset.community_id AS communityId, t_house_rent_asset.house_type_id AS houseTypeId, t_house_rent_asset.landlord_id AS landlordId, t_house_rent_asset.area, t_house_rent_asset.introduce_picture AS introducePicture, t_house_rent_asset.server_id AS serverId, t_house_rent_asset.cover, t_house_rent_asset.title, t_house_rent_asset.price, t_house_rent_asset.slide, t_house_rent_asset.rent_describe, t_house_rent_asset.rent_status AS rentStatus, t_house_rent_asset.status, t_house_rent_asset.note, t_house_rent_asset.rent_time AS rentTime, t_house_rent_asset.shelves_time AS shelvesTime, t_house_rent_asset.rate AS rate, t_house_rent_asset.house_number AS houseNumber, t_house_rent_asset.floor AS floor, t_house_rent_asset.toward AS toward, t_house_rent_asset.building_code AS buildingCode, t_house_rent_asset.community_name AS communityName, t_house_rent_asset.configuration_status AS configurationStatus
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_house_appointment JOIN t_end_user AS t1 ON t1.id=t_house_appointment.server_id JOIN t_end_user AS t2 ON t2.id = t_house_appointment.user_id JOIN t_house_rent_asset on t_house_appointment.address_id=t_house_rent_asset.id
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_appointment.id =#{record.id}
AND t_house_appointment.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.code},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.type_id =#{record.typeId}
AND t_house_appointment.type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.type},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.user_id =#{record.userId}
AND t_house_appointment.user_phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userPhone},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userName},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.server_id =#{record.serverId}
AND t_house_appointment.server_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.serverName},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.server_phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.serverPhone},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.name},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.address_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.addressId},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.address_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.addressName},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.description},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.icon LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.icon},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.status},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.confirm_status=#{record.confirmStatus}
AND t_house_appointment.fee LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.fee},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.appointment_time >= #{record.nowDate}
AND t_house_appointment.appointment_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.appointmentTime},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.appointment_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.appointmentStrTime},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.close_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.closeTime},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.payment_timestamp LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.paymentTimestamp},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.payment_method LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.paymentMethod},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.earliest_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.earliestTime},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.latest_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.latestTime},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.field_c LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.fieldC},'%')
AND t_house_appointment.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_appointment.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
ORDER BY t_house_appointment.create_time DESC
